name: Abdullah Kakar
story: Hafiz Gailani was born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan. He joined the local militia at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship. Hafiz is married and has two children, a son and a daughter. He is a devout Muslim and often spends his free time reading the Quran. Despite being a skilled soldier, Hafiz is known for his calm and collected demeanor under pressure, which has saved his squad's lives on numerous occasions.
